SoftwareVersions: BIDS Conversion by TAPAS PhysIO Toolbox (R2024a-v9.0.0)

cardiac.Description: continuous pulse measurement (processed: normalized amplitudes, padded for scan duration, scan trigger extracted)

respiratory.Description: continuous amplitude measurements by respiration belt (processed: normalized amplitudes, padded for scan duration, scan trigger extracted)

trigger.Description: continuous binary indicator variable of scan volume trigger signal detected by PhysIO
